backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing dashboard Inside-section changes and associated files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables and dark‑mode CSS definitions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint with early dark‑mode sync script and React mount point.
frontend/public/study-planner-mockup.htm: Standalone static mockup showing a styled Study Planner UI using CDN React.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for dashboard, subjects, and utility pages.
frontend/src/components/AddChapterDialog: Dialog component for adding a chapter with fields for name, lecture count, and duration.
frontend/src/components/AllChaptersBySub: Lists subjects with completed and incomplete chapters using badges and icons.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedIcon.tsx: Wrapper that adds active animation styling around Lucide icons.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that displays error details and offers home navigation, reload, and local data reset options.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavigation: Bottom navigation bar that builds nav items from static routes and subjects, highlighting the active path.
frontend/src/components/ChapterCard.tsx: Card UI for a chapter with timers, status display, working session controls, and manual entry management.
frontend/src/components/ChapterDetailPan: Slide-out panel showing detailed chapter info with status updates and editable lecture and target-hour fields.
frontend/src/components/DashboardComplet: Displays per-subject chapter completion stats as a bar-style distribution chart.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout with header, customization panel, page transitions, and optional bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/MonthGridCalenda: Generates a full month grid with navigation, date selection, and optional entry indicators.
frontend/src/components/NotificationsSec: Aggregates incomplete chapters, todos, and today's calendar entries to display notification counts and lists inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/OverallPerforman: Computes test score trends, average performance, and renders a custom SVG line chart with trend indicators.
frontend/src/components/PageTransition.t: Wraps page content with a fade transition triggered by route changes.
Displays subject resources with add and delete functionality using a sidebar-style card.
frontend/src/components/SubjectCompletio: Calculates chapter completion stats and renders an animated progress bar and chapter grid visualization.
frontend/src/components/SubjectDeleteBut: Provides a confirmation dialog to delete a subject and shows a toast on success.
frontend/src/components/TasksDrawer.tsx: Implements a slide-in drawer for navigation and subject-specific todo management, including add, toggle, and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/TestScoreChart.t: Renders a responsive line or bar chart for test scores with SVG scales, grid lines, and interactive points.
frontend/src/components/TodoList.tsx: Displays a subject-specific todo list with add, toggle, and delete functionality using useTodos.
frontend/src/customization/applyDarkMode: Applies light or dark mode to the document root based on override settings.
frontend/src/customization/Customization: Provides a small settings button that triggers opening the customization panel.
UI panel allowing users to adjust theme, study settings, and other customization options via sliders, toggles, and inputs.
Provides customization settings context, syncing dark mode and managing draft settings.
frontend/src/customization/integration.t: Contains helper functions for notifications, sleep window checks, card density, and target-hour/date calculations.
frontend/src/customization/settingsModel: Defines customization settings schema, defaults, and validation logic.
frontend/src/customization/useCustomizat: Manages saving, loading, applying, and deleting user-defined customization presets in localStorage.
Loads, saves, validates, and updates user customization settings with versioned localStorage.
frontend/src/data/chapters.ts: Defines chapter types and provides an initial list of chapters for multiple subjects with metadata like lectures, duration, and status.
frontend/src/data/subjects.ts: Defines subjects and legacy mappings for routes and names used for compatibility and migration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCalendarEntries.ts: Manages calendar entries with localStorage persistence and provides CRUD helpers for date-keyed notes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChapterData.ts: Stores and syncs chapter data in localStorage, supports updates, additions, deletions, and cross-tab synchronization.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentlyWorkingCh: Tracks active chapter work sessions with timing, pause/resume, persistence, and version migration.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardInside.ts: Stores a single dashboard content string in localStorage with load/save logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardNote.ts: Stores a dashboard note string in localStorage with automatic persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardTitle.ts: Manages dashboard title persistence in localStorage with a default title.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides identity management via Internet Identity, including login, logout, state tracking, and context access.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: Manages note CRUD operations with localStorage persistence and versioning.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a placeholder hook exposing actor and fetch status for future backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useResources.ts: Handles subject-specific resources with migration logic, defaults, and localStorage syncing.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyLog.ts: Tracks study log entries, persists them, and triggers sleep-window warnings.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubjectDetails.ts: Stores and updates per-subject metadata like lectures and target hours using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubjects.ts: Manages subject list CRUD with duplicate checks and persistent storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useTests.ts: Manages tests, scores, and chart settings with full CRUD and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useTodos.ts: Handles per-subject todos with migration from legacy data and persistent storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useTodosAll.ts: Provides access to all todos with automatic reloading on storage changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/appLocalStorage.ts: Provides a list of app-specific LocalStorage keys and helpers to clear or retrieve them.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarDashboard.tsx: Implements a calendar dashboard with a month grid and daily to‑do entries, including add/edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/pages/Customize.tsx: Provides a customization panel for UI settings, presets, and subject management with save/apply logic.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard showing stats, active chapters, editable title/note, and related widgets.
frontend/src/pages/Notes.tsx: Implements a notes manager with create, edit, delete, and viewing functionality.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectPage.tsx: Renders the subject detail page with chapter management, editing subject metadata, time tracking, and navigation logic.
frontend/src/pages/Tests.tsx: Implements test and score management UI with creation, editing, deletion, and performance chart settings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including features, versions, and configuration notes for the dashboard enhancement project.
